name: Code Red - Uprise
description:
Code Red is an early access free to play third person shooter.

The game is built using CoinMode tech and designed as a demo of the capabilities of the system while offering a fully-fledged multiplayer experience.

Using your CoinMode wallet, receive real-world rewards through participating in sponsored matches in this early access play to earn experience.

Over time the game will continue to receive updates, and will eventually run regular tournaments in which users can larger prizes from sponsored competitions (date TBC).

For queries & bugs please contact: support@coinmode.com

Discord: https://discord.gg/f3Q3Y9Hn

Twitter: https://twitter.com/coinmode

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coinmodepayments/

Website: https://www.coinmode.com
